page.title: 09ST. OSWINS & HOLY TRINITY
page.content:
{St. OSWINS CHURCH WYLAM {(Reverend D.Wood Wylam 3254) St. Oswins church is situated in the centre of Wylam. The vicar is the Reverend David Wood. Holy Communion at 8.30a.m. and 9.45a.m. on Sundays. Evensong at 6.30p.m. On the third Sunday of evry month a family service is held at 9.45a.m. and Holy Communion at 6.30p.m. On Wednesdays Holy Communion is held at 9.30a.m. The church was built in 1885 and was built of stone. There is also a tower and perpendicular window frames. {HOLY TRINITY, HORSLEY It was erected as a chapel in 1884. It has a Roman altar from Featherwood which stands in the porch.
{
